solution_line_template: A baker has a total of {cheesecakes_display} + {cheesecakes_fridge} = <<{cheesecakes_display}+{cheesecakes_fridge}={total_cheesecakes}>>{total_cheesecakes} cheesecakes both from the display and the fridge.
Therefore, there are {total_cheesecakes} - {sold_cheesecakes} = <<{total_cheesecakes}-{sold_cheesecakes}={cheesecakes_left_to_sell}>>{cheesecakes_left_to_sell} more cheesecakes to be sold.
